feed.title: SAP Community - HCM (Human Capital Management)
feed.subtitle: HCM (Human Capital Management) Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Pay Range in Job Requisition
entry.content:
We are looking to map the Pay Range in EC to the Job Requisition fields, but we are facing a challenge due to the fact that the pay ranges have different minimum, maximum, and midpoint values. Also, this pay ranges is not maintained in position, hence we need to create a basic rule. Below is an example of the pay ranges we are working with:

Example Pay Ranges:

Pay Range ID: Pay Range 1

  • Minimum Pay 1: 43,200
  • Maximum Pay 1: 64,800
  • Mid Point 1: 54,000
  • Minimum Pay 2: 44,800
  • Maximum Pay 2: 67,200
  • Mid Point 2: 56,000
  • Minimum Pay 3: 44,800
  • Maximum Pay 3: 67,200
  • Mid Point 3: 56,000

Expected Mapping in Job Requisition:

When a recruiter selects a specific Pay Range ID in the Job Requisition, the following fields should be mapped as follows:

If Pay Range 1 is selected:

  • ABS Min: Should be equal to Minimum Pay 1 (43,200)
  • ABS Median: Should be equal to Mid Point Pay 1 (54,000)
  • ABS Max: Should be equal to Maximum Pay 1 (64,800)
  • TTC Min: Should be equal to Minimum Pay 2 (44,800)
  • TTC Median: Should be equal to Mid Point Pay 2 (56,000)
  • TTC Max: Should be equal to Maximum Pay 2 (67,200)
  • TDC Min: Should be equal to Minimum Pay 3 (44,800)
  • TDC Median: Should be equal to Mid Point Pay 3 (56,000)
  • TDC Max: Should be equal to Maximum Pay 3 (67,200)

Question:

Is it possible to implement this mapping dynamically using a rule in EC? Specifically, we want the rule to be easy to maintain and automatically update whenever the Pay Range in EC changes. This would prevent the need for manually updating the rule in the requisition each time the Pay Ranges are updated.

If this is feasible, could you please provide guidance on how to configure such a rule?

Your assistance would be greatly appreciated!

entry.title: SAP Enable Now - Troubleshooting - Cannot Record
entry.content:
Dear Team,

I have a Author in our group whom was able to record in Producer initially, but after a week the recording functionality stopped completely.

Herewith the notes and errors:

  1. Error file indicating the handshake error: -RecordingAutomat::handshake_ - HANDSHAKE FAILED - switching to out of process hook
  2. No network, proxy, or antivirus settings that has been changed, to your knowledge (can anyone from IT at Aegis confirm this for us?)
  3. Method to Uninstall all existing extensions from all the browsers that has been used and reinstall from the Manager App has been done.
  4. Only one extension is installed at a time, specifically the "SAP Enable Now, desktop application recorder."
  5. Other conflicting extensions has been uninstalled.
  6. Cache has been cleared and reboot done afterwards

 

Specs:

  • Chip: Apple M2
  • Memory: 16 GB
  • macOS: Version 15.6.1 Sequoia

 

The Author is running Windows using parallels:

  • Parallels version: 26.1.1
  • Windows version: 11 Pro, 24H2 
  • OS Build: 26100.6584
  • Memory used: 6 GB

 

It might be changed after an update of the Windows version. But the Author removed windows completely and installed it again, but this didn’t solve this issue. I reiterate that he was able at first, but cannot record any longer.
Any information would be helpful!

entry.title: How to Break Down Vendor Amounts While Posting Payroll Results to Finance in SAP HCM
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am encountering an issue during payroll posting to Finance (via PCP0). The system is currently posting the entire vendor-related amount as one summarized line item in the FI document, whereas other salary components are being posted correctly in a separate document.

For instance, the total vendor amount of 53,000 is being combined and posted as a single entry, while Finance requires a detailed breakup of each wage type that hits the vendor account. The expected breakdown should be as follows:

Wage Type Description Amount
1001Solar Loan 8,000
1002Advance Salary20,000
1003Special Loan10,000
1004Vehicle Loan 15,000

Could you please guide me on how to configure the system so that the vendor postings are broken down by wage type rather than being summarized into a single amount?

Any guidance or best practice for achieving a detailed vendor posting structure would be highly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your support.

Best regards,
HCM (Human Capital Management) FIN (Finance)

entry.title: Delete replication request for an employee
entry.content:
We are using EC to SAP replication.

We have this employee stuck in a perpetual replication request due to one of the infotypes got an error, however, others infotypes got updated.

Additionally, EC Admin confirmed that no current change was made to the employee in EC. We removed the employee from the replication queue via the DRM tool. However the employee still got updated in SAP.

We are not on ECS4HCM thus we do not have ECPAO_EE_DELETION. Thus asking here how to go about deleting this replication request for this employee.

entry.title: Payroll EG Issue – Need to Process Salaries in Non-EGP Currencies for Foreign
entry.content:
We are currently facing a challenge in our SAP HCM Payroll configuration related to processing salaries for employees working in countries outside Egypt. These employees are assigned to companies that operate in different countries and pay salaries in local currencies (e.g., USD, KES, etc.).

However, when we run payroll using the Egypt-specific payroll driver (RPCALCE0), the system automatically converts all salary amounts into the Egyptian Pound (EGP), regardless of the company’s local currency. This behavior does not align with our business requirement, as we need to process and disburse salaries in the respective company currency, not in EGP.

We would appreciate your guidance on how to configure the system to support multi-currency payroll processing, ensuring that salaries are calculated and paid in the correct company-specific currency without being converted to EGP.

Please let us know the recommended approach or any necessary configuration steps to achieve this.

entry.title: Change reference number in PCPO payroll posting results
entry.content:

Currently Reference number is showing like XXXXX00001, instead we need soemthing like staff00001 or worker 00001.

entry.title: How to trigger SuccessFactors To-do or Email Notifications from PCC Alerts?
entry.content:
Hi Community,

When an alert is assigned to a user through Payroll Control Center (PCC), it currently shows under "My Alerts" in PCC. We would like these alerts to also:

  • Appear as To-do Notification on the SuccessFactors homepage or
  • Trigger an email notification to the assigned user.

This would help ensure that users are notified promptly without needing to manually check "My Alerts".

Would appreciate any guidance on:

  1. Is there any standard way to enable PCC alerts to trigger SuccessFactors To-Do notification or email notification? If yes, could you provide the configuration steps to enable it?
  2. If not, what are the possible integration options or recommendations to make this work?
  3. Any related SAP Notes, guides, or examples would be really helpful. 

Our setup: 

SAP HCM for payroll and SAP SuccessFactors for Employee Central

Thanks in advance for your help!

Shaeshanthika M B

entry.title: in what specific scenarios should this certificate be renewed? (Certificate *.sapsf.com)
entry.content:
Based on the note https://me.sap.com/notes/2533915, in what scenarios should this certificate be renewed?

I've been reviewing SAP systems infrastructure: * I reviewed the HCM Security Center * I reviewed the BTP Certificates section * I reviewed the Security Material / Keystore sections

I've also been reviewing the connections to Third-Party Platforms that interact with the SAP HCM ecosystem systems: * IBM API Connect * IBM SFG

I currently don't have a certificate installed on any of them associated with the alert email sent by sapcloudsupport@alerts.ondemand.com (email "_.sapsf.com Certificate Renewal (Part 2 of 2).eml")

The only place I found the indicated certificate is in the SSL padlock on the main hcm19 site (See attached "hcm19.sapsf.com" / "hcm19preview.sapsf.com")

In that regard, in what specific scenarios should this certificate be renewed?

Regards,

entry.title: HCM road map
entry.content:
Hi,

 

I am currently an SAP HCM consultant with a focus on technical and functional aspects on ECC6 no knowledge on S4HANA.

I would like to develop my skills. I have knowledge of PA/OM and procedural ABAP techniques. With the aim of becoming a technical-functional expert in HCM, what learning roadmap would you suggest?

My goal is to become highly competent in the functional area, which represents about 85% of my work.

Do you have any other recommendations for courses to take and interesting certifications at SAP? (I have access to the SAP Learning Hub), so I am entitled to four certification attempts.

entry.title: Help needed on AI agent for HR processes in HCM
entry.content: I am techno functional consultant and working in transformation in HCM space. How can we reimagine HR process and come up with high level framework or solution with infused AI agents in the existing process. Since I am new to SAP and SuccessFactors and have been tasked to work on Using Native AI agent and work for building AI agent for HR processes, can you please provide me a detailed process maps or blueprint with the processes and the sub processes and where we can use the AI agents and make the HR processes more streamlined. Can you provide me techno functional documentation and write-up or Use Case that I can refer and create some solution. We want to propose new Operating model using Native AI agent in the existing process like Recruitment, Onboarding. Employee Lifecycle Management, Core HR, Payroll, Separation

entry.title: SAP Academy Instructor Manuals
entry.content:
Hi All,

What is the correct process to follow with regards to old hard copies of SAP Manuals? I was a SAP Academy Instructor many years ago and have HR manuals printed in the 2012 versions. I would like to bless someone with this content as it could help young learners that might want to explore the ERP industry and does not have corporate experience yet. The manuals could still serve as foundational knowledge. However, I do want to follow the correct legal avenue regarding this and do not just want to throw it away. May I donate it to someone or a learning center?
I am based in South Africa.

entry.title: Validation for only employee without allowance is able to submit transportation claim in Concur
entry.content:
Hi All FI, SuccessFactors, and Concur Experts.

If we may know,
currently there is an inquiry from the end-user about the feasibility of set-up a kind of validation or restriction rule to only employee that receive "monthly transport allowance" will not be able to submit "taxi/transportation charges" claim via SAP Concur system.

Would you like to kindly help us on giving advice whether there is any specific technical field or information that we could use as such an indicator to know which personel number of employee that receive "monthly transport allowance" in SAP FI or SAP SuccessFactors? to be further integrated or acknowledged (captured) by the Concur system then.

Thank you so much, and we are looking forward to discussing this with you.

Ani.

@RafaelMira @Ronak_Jhuthawat @ctf_jacqting @Michaela_Sedlicka @LeoSupriano @katharina_sorge @yogeshgsalvi @harinarasimha @siddharthrajora

entry.title: how to set the data effective date always equal to the end date of a range filter?
entry.content:
Hi, I'm building a report to analyze hiring quality in SF story report by calculating the 12-month rolling retention rate (% of new hires still with company).

I've encountered a data recency issue. Since employee status is live, the report results change daily. I need the results for a specific period to be fixed.

For example (Oct 2024 - Sep 2025):

  • 95 new hires in total.
  • Today's data: 15 are left.
  • Data as of Sep 30, 2025: 12 are left.

My Goal: I want the report to always use the status as of the period's end date (e.g., Sep 30, 2025 for the Oct 24-Sep 25 period), regardless of when the report is run.

Is there a solution to automatically set the "Data Effective Date" to equal the "Duration End Date"?

Thanks for your help.

entry.title: Country Picklist- Comma in Korea causing issues
entry.content:
Hello,

WE HAVE COUNTRY OF RESIDENCE PICKLIST THAT HAS SAP STANDARD KOREA LABELS WITH COMMAS:

  1. Korea, Republic of
  2. Korea, Democratic People's Republic of

 

PROVISIONING ONBOARDING REPORT THAT FEEDS TO OUR SFTP THEN SAP ECC IS IMPACTING OUR INTERNAL JOBS IN SAP ECC BECAUSE THE COMMA IS COMING OVER FROM SUCCESSFACTORS LABEL.

CAN SAP STRIP THE COMMA IN BACK-END SO IT DOESNT IMPACT SAP ECC?                                                                                 

We already tried adding QUOTES " on the field that gets sent and it is supposed to tell the system to ignore the comma in the field and just look at everything in between the " " as the label but thats not working.

Thanks

entry.title: Variable Pay-Custom Basis Calculation and Role Change Adjustment
entry.content:
Hello experts.

Our client requested the creation of a plan without targets, where the basis will be calculated using a custom calculation. They asked us to investigate whether it would be possible to adjust the Target Bonus percentage in some way, applying a proportional adjustment in cases where an employee changes role during the year.

For example, if an employee moves from job code X to job code Y after six months, and we kept the %Target Bonus from the effective date on 31/12/yyyy, the percentage would end up being lower. Ηow historical records from Job Info fields can be included in a custom calculation and influence the final result.

Does anyone have something to suggest or any advice?

Thank you in advance!
